metadata.synopsis: The player characters react to finding an empty display altar for the Blood of Lathander.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 74; 8; 68 in CRE_Main_A  and use the plaque. Wait for the narrator to read the plaque. The PAD will play immediately after.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: So they kept the 'Blood of Lathander' here? No wonder it was looted.
